item.title: How To Get Free N20,000 Airtime on MTN | 2022
item.dc:creator: Hardeywarlex
item.description: MTN has recently launched an offer to reward customers who link their National Identification Number (NIN) to their MTN lines. This offer is being made to Nigerians by the South African-owned telecommunications company. Early 2022, all Nigerians were directed to link their NIN to their Sim cards with a deadline attached. This deadline keeps getting …

item.title: How To Link Nin To Ntel, Smile & Spectranet Simcards
item.dc:creator: Hardeywarlex
item.description: The Federal Government of Nigeria through the Telecom Regulatory agencies and National Identity Management Commission has directed that all existing and new subscribers link Nin to their SIM card(s) with their National Identification Number (NIN). Failure to do this will result in baring/loss of active SIMS. This order has been taken into action and all …

item.title: FG Orders Telecom operators to block unlinked NIN-SIMs from calls
item.dc:creator: Hardeywarlex
item.description: The Nigerian Government, on Monday, ordered telecommunications companies to bar (Block Unlinked Nin – Sim) outgoing calls on mobile lines not linked with the National Identification Number (NIN). This was made known by the Minister of Communications and Digital Economy, Isa Pantami, in a statement on Monday. According to him, the move is part of …

item.title: How To Link Nin To 9mobile Simcard
item.dc:creator: Hardeywarlex
item.description: Link Nin to 9mobile Sim card — The Federal Government through the Nigerian Communications Commission (NCC) has directed that all SIM cards must be linked to a National Identification Number (NIN). To avoid blockage of 9mobile Sims in Nigeria, 9mobile now has a simple, easy and convenient multipurpose short code to verify and link customers’ …

item.title: How To Print Plastic NIN ID (Premium) For Physical Identification
item.dc:creator: Hardeywarlex
item.description: You can now print Plastic NIN ID (Premium NIN Slip) and keep it as a handy physical means of identification. The Improved NIN Slip has now been made possible to be printed in Plastic form with the premium plan which cost N1,000. It is no longer news that FG has extended NIN linkage to SIM …

item.title: How To Download And Print The Improved Nin Slip
item.dc:creator: Hardeywarlex
item.description: After several years of many Nigerians waiting to get their plastic national ID Card after enrolling for NIN, a new method of getting the original NIN was announced recently by the National Identity Management Commission (NIMC). The NIMC has assured Nigerians that the new slip can be used anywhere in the world for identity verification.The …

item.title: NCC gives telecos two weeks to block SIM cards not registered with NIN
item.dc:creator: Hardeywarlex
item.description: The Nigerian Communications Commission (NCC) has ordered all telecommunication operators in the country to block all SIM cards that are not registered with the National Identity Numbers (NIN), within two weeks, starting from December 16, 2020, to December 30, 2020. This order was given after an urgent meeting of key stakeholders in the Communications industry …
